website_summaries.verdict: Even though it's not as practical for older, larger kids or adults as some others on our list, it's an affordable scooter with user-friendly features that most kids will love.
pros: Straightforward design that's easy for young children to use
Folds easily for storage when not in use
A bit less pricey than similar models
cons: Though adults can use it, this scooter is only rated to hold up to 110 pounds

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!
customer_reviews.text: My kids love these so much! I was a little hesitant because some of the reviews stated that the scooter broke right away or that the handle just popped off. But luckily we haven't had any issues! My oldest was using a regular toboggan to snow board down our hill, but after she got this for Christmas, she's been so happy to glide right down without having to worry about falling over. I have a 10 year old and a 5 year old and they can both use their scooters without any issues. Everything is sturdy and durable. Very fun!!
customer_reviews.author: R. Randall

customer_reviews.title: It seems like the handle is too low for him and since ...
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old is very tall. That being said, he seems to struggle using this as a scooter on the snow. It seems like the handle is too low for him and since it moves, it is hard for him to keep steady. Maybe over time he will get better? He seems to love going down hills with it. I love that there is plenty of foot room for both feet. Our neighbor has a different kind that is also pretty cool, but there isn't much room for his feet on there. So this snow scooter is pretty cool, but I wish the handle went up higher.

product_meta.title: Best Choice Products Kids Snow Scooter Sledge Folding Sliding Ski Snowboard with Grip Handle
product_meta.description: Regular sleds are fun and all, but nothing beats shredding down a snow hill while standing! This snow scooter eliminates any need to purchase those expensive snowboards and the pricey accessories they require. Constructed with safety in mind, the anti-slip design on top of the board keeps riders from slipping while surfing down the slopes. Strap your gear up and grab your snow scooter; it’s time to hit the snow! SPECIFICATIONS: Overall Dimensions: 36”(L) x 9”(W) x 28”(H) Weight: 4.5 lbs. Material: Plastic Color: Blue, Black No assembly required
feature_bullets: MULTIFUNCTIONAL SNOW SCOOTER: Ideal for use as a scooter or compact sled, as it lets you glide down snowy slopes while standing or sitting
BALANCED STEERING: Made with handle bars that allow for easier balancing and help with controlling direction for a smooth ride
ANTI-SLIP FOOTBOARD: Designed to keep riders safe, with a non-slip footboard coating that helps you maintain your footing as you ride
FOLDABLE, SPACE-SAVING DESIGN: Simply fold the handle bars down to store it in your car or a compact space at home after use
DURABLE MATERIAL: Crafted with durable plastic material to help keep riders shredding for years; OVERALL DIMENSIONS: 36"(L) x 9"(W) x 28"(H)
